summary: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.
cast: Timothy Olyphant|Radha Mitchell|Joe Anderson|Danielle Panabaker|Christie Lynn Smith|Brett Rickaby|Preston Bailey|John Aylward|Joe Reegan|Glenn Morshower|Larry Cedar|Gregory Sporleder|Mike Hickman|Lisa K. title: The Crazies
